phenomenalpeople.org.uk

Custom UGC app and marketing site for Creative Cherry

Led a team of three on a tight deadline to build this site / application that allows users to add their own "Phenomenal People" to the directory, and also showcases an associated live theatre event. Uses Silverstripe (a PHP MVC framework and CMS), and is responsive.

  • Silverstripe
  • Custom Application
  • PHP
  • HTML5
  • JavaScript
  • Grunt
  • Sass
  • BEM
  • CSS
  • Fabric
  • Front-end
  • Back-end
